import { useState } from 'react' import React from 'react' import './Navbar.css' import logo from '../assets/logo.png' import cartIcon from '../assets/Trolley.png' const Navbar = () => { const [menu,setMenu] = useState("shops") return (
Happy Shoppy...
  • {setMenu("shop")}}>Shop{menu === "shop"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("shop")}}>Men {menu === "shop"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("shop")}}>Women
  • {setMenu("shop")}}>Kids
0
) } export default Navbar
